column7: where DK is Kipp’s distance (the distance between the tip of the first secondary feather and the tip of the longest primary feather) and Lw is wing length"

Description: Adult body mass which was aggregrated from multiple records for a given species from the Amniote database. Other sources could include Eltontraits but Amniote metadata included more thorough documentation such as data validation.

Source: Sheard et al. 2020 computed range size by intersecting global range polygons with a 1° × 1° grid and counting the number of grid cells overlapped by each polygon
